## Fars package 

This package is aimed to show the data from the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) Fatality Analysis Reporting System (FARS).  
It provides tools for obtaining the dato from between the years 2013-2015.

## Inclcuded functions

The functions included in the package allow creating valid file name, loading the data and last mapping it.
